name: BLASTAR (Nathan More)
description:
Blast through space in this fun arcade shooter!

Notes:

The controls menu is out of date. [J] no longer fires weapon. Instead, use [Spacebar]. Also, doubling tapping [A] and [D] will also activate dodge now.

The white sphere is a health power-up and the white cube is a double-points power-up. Both assets will be replaced soon with new art.
